mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.xingming AS "xingming", a.xingbie AS "xingbie", a.shengfenz AS "shengfenz", CONCAT(xiaoqu.mingcheng,'-',loudong.mingcheng,'-',danyuan.mingcheng,'-',taohu.mingcheng) AS "path", a.heimingd AS "heimingd", a.pids AS "pids", a.renyuanlx AS "renyuanlx", a.gongzuodw AS "gongzuodw", a.zhuzhaidh AS "zhuzhaidh", a.danweidh AS "danweidh", a.suishendh AS "suishendh", a.hukouszd AS "hukouszd", a.zhaopian AS "zhaopian", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN wuye_jichu AS taohu ON a.pid=taohu.id LEFT JOIN wuye_jichu AS danyuan ON taohu.pid=danyuan.id LEFT JOIN wuye_jichu AS loudong ON danyuan.pid=loudong.id LEFT JOIN wuye_jichu AS xiaoqu ON loudong.pid=xiaoqu.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dict_renyuan( id, xingming, xingbie, shengfenz, pid, pids, renyuanlx, gongzuodw, zhuzhaidh, danweidh, suishendh, hukouszd, zhaopian, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{xingming}, #{xingbie}, #{shengfenz}, #{pid}, #{pids}, #{renyuanlx}, #{gongzuodw}, #{zhuzhaidh}, #{danweidh}, #{suishendh}, #{hukouszd}, #{zhaopian}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dict_renyuan SET xingming = #{xingming}, xingbie = #{xingbie}, shengfenz = #{shengfenz}, renyuanlx = #{renyuanlx}, gongzuodw = #{gongzuodw}, zhuzhaidh = #{zhuzhaidh}, danweidh = #{danweidh}, suishendh = #{suishendh}, hukouszd = #{hukouszd}, zhaopian = #{zhaopian}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
